data.question: What is the empirical formula of the asymmetric unit in bio-MOF-100?
What method was used for activating bio-MOF-100 to achieve high porosity?
data.answer: Supercritical CO2 exchange and subsequent evacuation

data.question: Is the crystal system of bio-MOF-100 cubic?
What is the calculated density (g cm − 3) of bio-MOF-100?
What is the maximum resolution (Å) achieved in the single crystal X-ray diffraction data collection for bio-MOF-100?
How does the size of the zinc-adeninate building unit (ZABU) compare to the basic zinc-carboxylate cluster?
data.answer: The ZABU is significantly larger than the basic zinc-carboxylate cluster.

data.question: Does bio-MOF-100 exhibit exclusively mesoporous cavities?
What is the BET surface area of bio-MOF-100?
What strategy was introduced for constructing mesoporous MOFs in the article?
data.answer: Constructing large metal-organic vertices instead of metal-carboxylate cluster vertices.

data.question: Is the framework of bio-MOF-100 interpenetrated?
What is the role of dimethylammonium cations in bio-MOF-100?
data.answer: They reside in the pores to balance the charge.

data.question: What is the underlying network topology of bio-MOF-100?
What is the space group of bio-MOF-100?
Did the gas adsorption studies confirm the mesoporosity of bio-MOF-100?
What is the significance of the large unit cell in bio-MOF-100?
data.answer: It indicates low crystalline density, resulting in weak diffraction characteristics.

data.question: What is the maximum pore volume reported for bio-MOF-100?
Does bio-MOF-100 maintain its crystallinity after gas adsorption studies?
What is the crystal size of bio-MOF-100?
What is the role of the zinc-adeninate building units (ZABUs) in the structure of bio-MOF-100?
data.answer: They serve as discrete metal-organic vertices for the construction of the framework.

data.question: Is the synthesis of bio-MOF-100 based on a solvothermal reaction?
